sentences.sContent: The effect was to disrupt the food chain, starving many animals and those that preyed on them.
sentences.sCn: 后果是打断食物链，使许多动物和捕食它们的动物饿死。

synos.tran: 捕食；牺牲者；被捕食的动物

phrases.pCn: 成为...的牺牲品；深受...之害

trans.tranOther: A creature that preys on other creatures lives by catching and eating them

trans.tranCn: 捕食；牺牲者；被捕食的动物
trans.tranOther: an animal, bird etc that is hunted and eaten by another animal
